```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(readxl)

pk <- read_excel("data/Gates_18_MALDI_Tissue Std PK R.xlsx")
```

```{r}
pk %>% 
  mutate(ID = 1:n()) %>%
  select(ID, Compound, MouseID, Group, Protocol_Animal, Dosing, Timepoint, Compartment, Parent) %>%
  rename(drug = Compound,
         mouse_number = MouseID) %>% 
  spread(key = Compartment, value = Parent)

# group_by(drug, mouse_number, Group, Protocol_Animal) %>%
```

Columns to keep: MouseID, Compound, Group, Protocol_Animal, Dosing, Timepoint, Collection, Compartment, Parent
